description: Significant pollution detected. Vulnerable groups should stay indoors; others should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.

recommendations.action: Implement traffic restrictions in hotspot zones
recommendations.reason: NO2=40.2 ppb indicates heavy traffic; PM2.5=197.0 µg/m³ poses health risk

recommendations.action: Issue respiratory health alert; increase medical preparedness
recommendations.reason: High PM2.5=197.0 + humidity=83% increases respiratory risk

source_description: High PM2.5 indicates combustion sources (vehicles, industry, biomass burning)
